name: Charlie Byrd
description:
'''Charlie Lee Byrd''' (September 16, 1925 â€“ December 2, 1999) was an American [[jazz]] guitarist. Byrd was best known for his association with Brazilian music, especially [[bossa nova]]. In 1962, he collaborated with [[Stan Getz]] on the album ''[[Jazz Samba]]'', a recording which brought bossa nova into the mainstream of North American music.

Byrd played [[Fingerstyle guitar|fingerstyle]] on a [[classical guitar]].
